name: Mapmaker's Roost -- A Wanderhome Nature
description:
A Mapmaker’s Roost is a place which reveals things hidden, misleads the foolish, and guides the earnest.

Now, you can play with this new Nature in your Wanderhome games--perfect for a group of travelers on the road or staying up late at night, scribbling notes and stargazing.  

Created for the Wanderhome Discord server Playbook Jam #43: Maps.

A 6 String Games Production

Edited by Colin McNamara

Wanderhome is copyright of Possum Creek Games Inc. Mapmaker’s Roost is an independent production by 6 String Games and is not affiliated with Possum Creek Games Inc. It is published under the Wanderhome Third Party License.
